task.summary: - Made new branch: ani - made folders utils and dags - in utils folder: stored all code and classes to retrieve data (in json format) and push to a Postgres database. - in dags folder: made file main_dag.py that will be scheduled locally to run everyday to refresh data sitting in the revelant Postgres database and table.
Updated func push_to_postgres to have job_type as a param when pushing data to Postgres.
Updated func covid_19_dashboard_update in main_dag.py to have specify a job type when pushing data to a Postgres database/table.

- Added new funcs within the class GetData in dashboard_connector.py to get a list of country codes with their respective geo ids. - update funcs that make dataframes accordingly to add geo id as a column. - Added a config.py to file to store all important information to be stored. - Decided to create a Dash app for the dashboard instead of GDS as the Postgres connector only allows 100k rows- added an apps folder with app_layout.py & app_callbacks.py. Also added an overall app.py file which initiates the Dash app.
_ Updated config.py - Added functionality to add the following graphs to the Dash app: cases by country, deaths by country, death rate by country.

- Added new func in app_layout.py to add title and desc for graph. - Updated config.py to contain a font to be used in the Dash app. - Updated app.py to contain titles, desc and footnotes for graphs accordingly.

- Added charts and overall functionality to add a time series graph of Covid-19 data on the Dash app. - Added callback funcs in app_callbacks.py to update the time series graph accordingly. - Added funcs in app_layout.py to add a time series graph creation. - Updated the config.py to add more columns, continents and font - Added funcs in dashboard_connector.py to create time series data & create dropdown options - Added an __init__.py to initialise the cache and the Dash app. - Updated app.py to add all new graphs, callbacks and cache usage accordingly.
Updated the func create_death_rate_data in dashboard_connector.py to show percentage values.
Recreated the cache config to be much simpler.

- Updated file app_layout.py to add a choropleth graph map. - Added new func create_choropleth_data in class DashboardGraphs. - Updated app.py to add two choropleth graphs to the Dash app for total cases & deaths.
Changed the colour palettes of the world maps showing cases & deaths of Covid-19 across the world.
Updated the README.md, added a Procfile and requirements.txt to deploy to Heroku.

MESSAGE.value: - Made new branch: ani - made folders utils and dags - in utils folder: stored all code and classes to retrieve data (in json format) and push to a Postgres database. - in dags folder: made file main_dag.py that will be scheduled locally to run everyday to refresh data sitting in the revelant Postgres database and table.
Updated func push_to_postgres to have job_type as a param when pushing data to Postgres.
Updated func covid_19_dashboard_update in main_dag.py to have specify a job type when pushing data to a Postgres database/table.

- Added new funcs within the class GetData in dashboard_connector.py to get a list of country codes with their respective geo ids. - update funcs that make dataframes accordingly to add geo id as a column. - Added a config.py to file to store all important information to be stored. - Decided to create a Dash app for the dashboard instead of GDS as the Postgres connector only allows 100k rows- added an apps folder with app_layout.py & app_callbacks.py. Also added an overall app.py file which initiates the Dash app.

- Added new func in app_layout.py to add title and desc for graph. - Updated config.py to contain a font to be used in the Dash app. - Updated app.py to contain titles, desc and footnotes for graphs accordingly.

- Added charts and overall functionality to add a time series graph of Covid-19 data on the Dash app. - Added callback funcs in app_callbacks.py to update the time series graph accordingly. - Added funcs in app_layout.py to add a time series graph creation. - Updated the config.py to add more columns, continents and font - Added funcs in dashboard_connector.py to create time series data & create dropdown options - Added an __init__.py to initialise the cache and the Dash app. - Updated app.py to add all new graphs, callbacks and cache usage accordingly.
Updated the func create_death_rate_data in dashboard_connector.py to show percentage values.
Recreated the cache config to be much simpler.

- Updated file app_layout.py to add a choropleth graph map. - Added new func create_choropleth_data in class DashboardGraphs. - Updated app.py to add two choropleth graphs to the Dash app for total cases & deaths.
Changed the colour palettes of the world maps showing cases & deaths of Covid-19 across the world.
Updated the README.md, added a Procfile and requirements.txt to deploy to Heroku.
